title: Valencia Joins Colombia Center-Right Alliance Ahead of Primaries
description: Senator Paloma Valencia, who won the nomination for Colombia’s powerful Centro Democrático party, is joining an alliance of other hopefuls from the center and right which will hold a primary in March, according to a senior lawmaker from her party.
content: Senator Paloma Valencia, who won the nomination for Colombia’s powerful Centro Democrático party, is joining an alliance of other hopefuls from the center and right which will hold a primary in March, according to a senior lawmaker from her party.
